com.cloudpos.led

Interface LEDDeviceSpec

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DeviceSpec

    public interface LEDDeviceSpec
extends DeviceSpec
    The LEDDeviceSpec interface defines the specification of LED device.

    • Method Detail

      • getCounts

        int getCounts()
        Gets the counts of LED.

        Returns:
        the counts value.Returns 0 if not supported.

      • getColors

        byte[] getColors(int logicalID)
        Gets the color of the LED.

        Parameters:
        logicalID - The logical id of the LED.
        Returns:
        int color,Returns null if the input wrong parameter or not supported.

      • canQuickBlink

        boolean canQuickBlink(int logicalID)
        Whether to support quick blink.

        Every 500ms blink again.

        Parameters:
        logicalID - The logical id of the LED.
        Returns:
        true support. false not support,return false if parameter is wrong.

      • canSlowBlink

        boolean canSlowBlink(int logicalID)
        Whether to support slow blink.

        Every 1s blink again.

        Parameters:
        logicalID - The logical id of the LED.
        Returns:
        true Supported. false Not supported,return false if parameter is wrong.
